text: Soshite izen kara (Aru madina ni)-ka o motte ite, shinko o ukeireta-sha-tachi wa,(iju shite) kare-ra no moto ni kita mono o aigo shi, mata kare-ra (iju-sha 〔muhajiru〕 ) ni ataerareta (senri-hin) ni taishite mo kokoro no naka de hoshigaru koto mo naku, jibun (enjo-sha 〔ansaru〕 ) jishin ni sakinjite (kare-ra ni) ataeru. Tatoe jibun wa kyubo shite ite mo. Mata, jibun no don'yoku o yoku osaeta-sha-tachi. Korera no mono koso shifuku o joju suru monodearu
